kindnessMode.description: Explains complex Web3 terms in simple language

footer.contracts: Verified Smart Contracts on Polygon Amoy

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.connectDescription: Connect your wallet to access the AlmaNEO dashboard. View your token balance, staking, and Kindness Score.

airdrop.title: Airdrop
airdrop.subtitle: Complete tasks to earn ALMAN tokens
airdrop.connectWalletDesc: Connect your wallet to view and claim airdrops.
airdrop.contractNotAvailableDesc: The Airdrop contract is not deployed on this network. Please switch to Polygon Amoy Testnet.
airdrop.noCampaignsDesc: Check back later for new opportunities!
airdrop.earnMoreDesc: Complete tasks to become eligible for future airdrops

governance.title: Governance
governance.subtitle: Participate in AlmaNEO DAO decisions
governance.contractNotDeployedDesc: The governance contract has not been deployed yet. Below is a preview of the governance interface.
governance.connectWalletDesc: Connect your wallet to participate in governance
governance.alreadyVoted: You have voted on this proposal
governance.noProposalsDesc: Be the first to create a proposal for the AlmaNEO community!
governance.comingSoonDesc: Governance proposals will be available once the contract is deployed.
governance.comingSoonTooltip: Governance proposals will be enabled after mainnet launch

staking.title: Staking
staking.subtitle: Stake ALMAN to earn rewards and increase your governance power
staking.contractNotDeployedDesc: The staking contract has not been deployed yet. Please check back later or contact the team.
staking.connectWalletDesc: Connect your wallet to start staking ALMAN tokens

kindness.title: Kindness Protocol
kindness.subtitle: Build your Kindness Score through warm connections
kindness.connectDescription: Connect your wallet to check your Kindness Score and join meetups. Start your warm connections.
kindness.noSbtDesc: Automatically issued when you attend a meetup
kindness.noHostedMeetups: You haven't hosted any meetups yet

meetup.title: Meetups
meetup.subtitle: Meet offline and create warm connections
meetup.connectDescription: Please connect your wallet first to create a meetup.
meetup.hostRewardDesc: Earn <1>+{{host}} pts</1> on completion, <1>+{{hostLarge}} pts</1> with 10+ participants
meetup.fieldTitlePlaceholder: e.g. First AlmaNEO Meetup in Seoul
meetup.fieldDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a brief description of the meetup

tips.tip1: Use a clear and specific title
tips.tip3: Complete verification within 24 hours after the meetup
tips.tip4: Take a group photo with 3+ people

errors.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 5 characters

detail.notFoundDesc: The requested meetup does not exist.
detail.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave?
detail.selectPhotoAndParticipants: Please select a photo and participants.
detail.verifySuccess: Verification complete! Points have been awarded to participants.

blockchain.simple: A digital ledger recorded by multiple computers together.
blockchain.detailed: Once recorded, it's nearly impossible to alter, making it transparent and secure.
blockchain.example: You can verify transactions without needing a bank.

wallet.simple: An account that stores your digital assets.
wallet.detailed: Like a bank account, you can store, send, and receive tokens.
wallet.example: When you log in with Web3Auth, a wallet is automatically created for you.

gasPrice.simple: A fee paid to record data on the blockchain.
gasPrice.detailed: It's a network usage fee paid to the computers that process your transaction.
gasPrice.example: AlmaNEO covers gas fees for you, so you can use it for free!

transaction.simple: A single operation recorded on the blockchain.
transaction.detailed: Every action like token transfers or NFT purchases is recorded as a transaction.

smartContract.simple: A digital contract that executes automatically.
smartContract.detailed: When conditions are met, it runs on its own — no middleman needed.
smartContract.example: Staking rewards are paid automatically thanks to smart contracts.

polygon.simple: A fast and affordable blockchain network.
polygon.detailed: Compatible with Ethereum but with much lower gas fees.
polygon.example: AlmaNEO chose Polygon so everyone can use it without worrying about costs.

web3auth.simple: A service that lets you log into blockchain with social accounts.
web3auth.detailed: No complex wallet setup needed — just use Google, Facebook, etc.
web3auth.example: With Web3Auth, anyone can easily get started on AlmaNEO!

gasless.simple: Transactions that don't require you to pay gas fees.
gasless.detailed: The platform covers gas fees so users can interact for free.
gasless.example: Most transactions on AlmaNEO are gasless!

token.simple: A digital currency or asset on the blockchain.
token.detailed: Like in-game coins, tokens can be used within a specific platform.

alman.simple: The native token of the AlmaNEO platform.
alman.detailed: Used for staking, governance voting, NFT purchases, and more.
alman.example: You can earn ALMAN tokens as rewards for kindness activities.

neos.simple: The native token of the AlmaNEO platform.
neos.detailed: Used for staking, governance voting, NFT purchases, and more.
neos.example: You can earn ALMAN tokens as rewards for kindness activities.

totalSupply.simple: The total number of tokens that will ever be issued.
totalSupply.detailed: ALMAN has 8 billion tokens, symbolizing 8 billion people on Earth.

tge.simple: The event where tokens are first issued.
tge.detailed: Stands for Token Generation Event — the official launch of the token.

staking.detailed: Like a bank deposit — stake your tokens and receive rewards.
staking.example: Stake ALMAN to earn 5–18% annual rewards.

apy.detailed: Stands for Annual Percentage Yield — shows your expected earnings over a year.
apy.example: With 10% APY, staking 100 ALMAN gives you 110 ALMAN after one year.

airdrop.detailed: Done to promote new projects or reward the community.
airdrop.example: AlmaNEO airdrops tokens to people who do kindness activities.

liquidity.simple: How easily assets can be traded.
liquidity.detailed: High liquidity means you can buy or sell quickly at the price you want.

dex.simple: An exchange where you can trade tokens without a middleman.
dex.detailed: Stands for Decentralized Exchange — trades happen automatically via smart contracts.
dex.example: You can trade ALMAN on platforms like Uniswap or QuickSwap.

nft.simple: A one-of-a-kind digital proof of ownership.
nft.detailed: Stands for Non-Fungible Token — proves you own a digital item like art or collectibles.

sbt.simple: A special NFT that cannot be transferred.
sbt.detailed: Stands for Soulbound Token — once received, it can't be sold or moved.
sbt.example: Jeong-SBT permanently records your kindness score.

jeongSbt.simple: A soul token that proves your kindness.
jeongSbt.detailed: As your kindness score grows, your tier rises and you unlock more benefits.
jeongSbt.example: Reach Forest tier for a 50% discount on NFT fees!

royalty.simple: Revenue the original creator earns when an NFT is resold.
royalty.detailed: A wonderful Web3 feature that ensures creators keep earning from their work.

governance.simple: Collectively deciding the direction of a project.
governance.detailed: Token holders can participate in important decisions through voting.
governance.example: New features and partnerships are decided by community votes.

dao.simple: A digital organization governed by voting.
dao.detailed: Stands for Decentralized Autonomous Organization — runs without a central authority.
dao.example: The AlmaNEO DAO is led directly by its community.

proposal.simple: An item put up for vote in governance.
proposal.detailed: Anyone can submit a proposal, and token holders vote on it.

quorum.simple: The minimum participation needed for a vote to be valid.
quorum.detailed: AlmaNEO has a 4% quorum — at least 4% of all tokens must vote to pass.

jeong.simple: A deep emotional bond built over time together.
jeong.detailed: A uniquely Korean concept — a profound human connection that goes beyond simple kindness.
jeong.example: AlmaNEO carries this warm value on the blockchain.

gaii.simple: An index that measures AI inequality.
gaii.detailed: Stands for Global AI Inequality Index — quantifies AI accessibility by country.
gaii.example: The higher the score, the harder it is to access AI in that region.

kindnessScore.detailed: The more kind acts you do, the higher your score and benefits.
kindnessScore.example: A higher score means a higher Jeong-SBT tier!

kindnessProtocol.simple: A system that proves and rewards kindness.
kindnessProtocol.detailed: Proof of Humanity — a new way to prove your humanness.

globalSouth.detailed: Mainly refers to regions in Africa, South Asia, Southeast Asia, and Latin America.
globalSouth.example: AlmaNEO aims to improve AI accessibility in the Global South.

depin.detailed: Stands for Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network.
depin.example: Connecting personal computers to share AI computing power.
